name: Baldi's Basics but a little bit of everything!
name_original: Baldi's Basics but a little bit of everything!
description:
Development info:

DEMO RELEASED!

PLANNED RELEASE DATE or later: 7/4/2021

Planning to add: #1 Items: -Asoda: Infinite uses Acts like Bsoda -Safe teleporter: A safer teleporter that makes sure you don't die.
-Delete button: Deletes all characters for 60 seconds. (1 MINUTE) -Controller: Allows you to control 1 character for 30 seconds. Schoolhouse changes: Randomize level generation New characters: Susie: A second playtime Charales: A killer robot Harry: Basically baldi but with hair  Some cool stuff: Create levels and save them. If you die you can load to the last Autosave or save.  Also adding difficultys for the game. Easy: Baldi don;t go fast each time a notebook is collected. Normal: Baldi goes fast on every notebook you collect. Hardcore: Baldi goes very fast like 7 notebooks but you only collected 1, Also You need to collect 53 notebooks. Scrapped: Nothing yet! Follow me if you want to see the demo release!Also added a mod:I added a mod I don't own. It's Just credit for the original creator. Also Its a .zip file because I find it better to be a .zip file.
